page.title: 16A Lively Playgroup
page.content: There are thirty-four children attending Huntley Pre-School Playgroup.Thirteen are coming to the local school next term.Playgroup is held on Tuesdays,Thursdays and Fridays. When the children start they go for just one session,but as they get older the sessions increase up to three a week.They start at 9.45 and finish at noon.At eleven o'clock they have milk and biscuits and then they play games, such as jigsaws,puzzles,painting and dressing-up. They often go on picnics and on trips to farms,train stations and zoos.
